attributes.action: Encourage Local Councils to offer a Three Month Council Tax Break
attributes.background:
With so many of us deeply worried about our finances over the next few months due to the Coronavirus situation we would like the Government to approach our local councils for a Council Tax Holiday. 
This will assist families who are struggling to balance their bills at such an uncertain time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
